name: Social Distance Warrior
description:
Get out there and flatten the curve! With social distancing relaxing but infections still on the rise, can one lone Nurse protect her entire town from deadly disease. 

Collect medicine from drug stores to cure infected buildings. Avoid the infected (and everyone else) as much as you can or you'll be pulled off delivery!  If you can keep the city from being overrun for five minutes then the town will get over the curve and survive!

Features include:

  • Arcade Action!
  • Poorly rendered medicine!
  • An Infectious disease model that spreads over time.

Made for TOJam 2020 by Team Pufferfish.
